criteria: Understanding Legal Definition of a Weapon
Identification of Risks in the Community
descriptions: Student demonstrates no understanding of what constitutes a weapon according to Education Code (EC) Section 49330 and the Glossary.
Student demonstrates a limited understanding of what constitutes a weapon, missing key components of the legal definition.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of the legal definition of a weapon but with some inaccuracies or omissions.
Student demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of the legal definition of a weapon, accurately identifying most components.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of the legal definition of a weapon, accurately and comprehensively explaining its components.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of the legal definition of a weapon, including its implications and potential ambiguities.
Student fails to identify any risks associated with possessing a weapon at home.
Student identifies only one or two very basic risks associated with possessing a weapon at home.
Student identifies some risks associated with possessing a weapon at home, but the explanation lacks detail or depth.
Student identifies several relevant risks associated with possessing a weapon at home, providing adequate explanations.
Student identifies numerous and varied risks associated with possessing a weapon at home, providing detailed explanations and examples.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful analysis of the risks associated with possessing a weapon at home, including less obvious or commonly considered dangers.
Student fails to identify any risks associated with possessing a weapon at school.
Student identifies only one or two very basic risks associated with possessing a weapon at school.
Student identifies some risks associated with possessing a weapon at school, but the explanation lacks detail or depth.
Student identifies several relevant risks associated with possessing a weapon at school, providing adequate explanations.
Student identifies numerous and varied risks associated with possessing a weapon at school, providing detailed explanations and examples.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful analysis of the risks associated with possessing a weapon at school, including legal ramifications and impact on school climate.
Student fails to identify any risks associated with possessing a weapon in the community.
Student identifies only one or two very basic risks associated with possessing a weapon in the community.
Student identifies some risks associated with possessing a weapon in the community, but the explanation lacks detail or depth.
Student identifies several relevant risks associated with possessing a weapon in the community, providing adequate explanations.
Student identifies numerous and varied risks associated with possessing a weapon in the community, providing detailed explanations and examples.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful analysis of the risks associated with possessing a weapon in the community, including social, economic, and public health implications.
